name: All Is Lost - Ludum Dare 50
description:
ALL IS LOST

Humanity is counting on you. You are M4RL0w3, the last robot on earth to clean the World. The humans throw their trash down from cities in the sky. More and More Humans are born. Who is Faster? You or the Overpopulation?

Catch the Trash with the right Container. Don't Let the Trash Fall on the Ground.

Now Save the World!

Good Luck.

How To Play

Move with Arrow Keys and change the Containers with 1, 2 and 3.

Team
